personalInfo.summary: Senior Frontend Engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expert in the React ecosystem and performance optimization. Proven track record of leading teams and delivering high-impact projects.

bullets: Improved performance of the main dashboard.
Mentored 4 junior developers and established code quality standards.
Collaborated with UX team to redesign the onboarding flow.
Built responsive websites for 50+ clients using HTML/CSS/JS.
Integrated Stripe payments API for e-commerce projects.

issues.title: Quantify your achievements
issues.description: The bullet point "Improved performance" lacks metrics.
issues.suggestion: Change to "Improved dashboard load times by 40% via code splitting."

newContent: Improved dashboard load times by 40% via code splitting and memoization.
Mentored 4 junior developers and established code quality standards.
Collaborated with UX team to redesign the onboarding flow.

issues.title: Missing Keywords
issues.description: Your resume lacks keywords found in target job descriptions: "CI/CD", "Docker".
issues.suggestion: Add these to your skills or experience.

fixAction.newContent: Senior Frontend Engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expert in React, CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerization, and performance optimization.

newContent: Architected responsive web solutions for 50+ high-profile clients.
Integrated Stripe payments API for e-commerce projects.

MOCK_JOBS.title: Senior React Developer
MOCK_JOBS.description: We are looking for a Senior React Developer to lead our frontend team. Must have experience with micro-frontends and high-performance rendering.

MOCK_JOBS.title: Frontend Engineer II
MOCK_JOBS.description: Join our dynamic team building data visualization tools. D3.js and React expertise required.

MOCK_JOBS.title: Full Stack Engineer
MOCK_JOBS.description: Early stage startup looking for a generalist. React, Node, and AWS.
